title: La Maison des Bories = the House of the Bories
brief_description:
Carl is the young scholar who comes to live with French geologist Julian and his wife Isabelle and two children. Carl is eager to study with the famous geologist, but soon he is involved in a love affair with his mentor’s wife.

Credits: Producer, Philippe Dussart ; director, Jacques Doniol-Valcroze ; writer, Anne Tromelin ; photography, Ghislain Cloquet.
Cast: Marie Dubois, Maurice Garrel, Helene Vallier, Mathieu Cariere, Veronique Maurin.
